result.execSummary:
The defendant Isaiah Jeremy Guy was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Court orders defendant to provide a DNA sample and pay the DNA surcharges.
Pay mandatory costs, surcharges, DNA surcharge and assessments at the rate of $50 per month commencing 03-01-16.   If a payment is more than 10 days late, a civil judgment is to be entered against the defendant.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Isaiah Jeremy Guy

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: See CCAP financial payment plan application for specific monthly due dates for this UTPPP

Sentencing proceeds.   Statements by counsel and defendant.

COURT ORDERS defendant to serve 66 days at the House of Correction with 66 days credit; pay mandatory costs, DNA surcharges, assessments and surcharges at the rate of $50 per month commencing 3-1-16 if a payment is more than 10 days late, a civil judgment is to be entered against the defendant and subject to other collection.

COURT ORDERS:
- defendant to provide a DNA sample and pay the DNA surcharges.

Appeal rights given.  Pretrial Incarceration Credit and  received and filed.

Defendant waives constitutional rights, enters a plea of GUILTY to the amended charge and is examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum  received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the Complaint as a factual basis for judgment.  Court finds defendant guilty as amended in the Information and enters a judgment of conviction.

Defendant Isaiah Jeremy Guy in court with attorney Ann T. Bowe.  Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds

On motion of the State, Court AMENDS the charge to a Possession of THC 961.41(3g)(e) an unclassified misdemeanor.

Defendant Isaiah Jeremy Guy in court with attorney Ann T. Bowe.  Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds

ADA Murphy has contacted the officers and an essential witness is in the hospital.  Parties move for an adjournment.  

  Motion hearing scheduled for December 21, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Isaiah Jeremy Guy in court with attorney Ann T. Bowe.  Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense newly retained. Received discovery.  Motion hearing scheduled for November 17, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Isaiah Jeremy Guy in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter before the Court for Suppression Motion.  Defendant requesting time to retain private counsel.  Defense motion to withdraw heard and granted SUBJECT TO defendant securing new counsel.  The Court advises the defendant that if new counsel is not present on the next date then the matter will continue with Attorney Sargent as the attorney of record.  Status conference scheduled for October 15, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
State's Respone to Motion to Suppress received and filed./ds

15RM028330  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
06/07/2015
Motion to suppress:  Unlawful:  Subsequent search:  Challenge to consent to search person:  Police continuing search after defendant demands end to search, received and filed.  aw

Defendant Isaiah Jeremy Guy in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin for Antonella Aleman.
Defense counsel has filed a motion.  State to respond by 9/1/2015.  Parties notified as of August 3, 2015, case will be assigned to Judge Konkol, branch 44, in room 316 of the safety building.  Case adjourned for motion hearing on 9/10/2015 at 1:30 pm, branch 44.  aw  Motion hearing scheduled for September 10, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, defendant Isaiah Jeremy Guy not in court, in custody.  Antonella Aleman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense counsel wants to see if defendant will be revoked, and may file a motion.   Case adjourned for scheduling conference on 6/8/2015 at 8:30 am, branch 3.  Court ordered all motions be filed by the next court date.  aw  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 8, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, defendant Isaiah Jeremy Guy not in court, in custody.  Patricia I. Daugherty appeared for the State of Wisconsin for Antonella Aleman.
Court is in trial.  Defense counsel requests more time to talk with client.  Case adjourned for scheduling conference on 5/27/2015 at 8:30 am, branch 3.  All motions due next court date.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  aw  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 27, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Certification of transcript of proceedings of PRELIMINARY HEARING commencing 05/01/2015 received and filed. (8 Pages.)
Copy of transcript forwarded to Stephen Sargent, Milwaukee Office of the State Public Defender, 819 North 6th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53233.

Defendant Isaiah Jeremy Guy in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Isaiah Jeremy Guy in custody.  Ronald Dague for Antonella Aleman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Court took judicial notice of certified documents regarding case #07CF3919 that are attached to the complaint.  Sworn for the state:Sergio Rentas-MPD Officer.    State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and pleads not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 03.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 12, 2015 at 08:30 am.

No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Isaiah Jeremy Guy in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Isaiah Jeremy Guy in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Fiorenza, Branch 03.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 1, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
